data.name: Monkey Fest USA 2020
data.description:
MonkeyFestUSA is a brand-new Developers conference focused on covering all aspects of Cross-platform mobile development within the .NET ecosystem.
We will be covering topics like Testing, Automation, Reactive Programming, UI/UX, Maui, Xamarin.Forms, and other related topics.

data.name: General
data.description: Conferences covering a wide range of web development and software engineering topics.

relatedRecords.name: AsyncAPI Online Conference
relatedRecords.description: It all started like a crazy idea. Since we’re all confined at home due to the coronavirus pandemic, why not organizing a fully-remote online conference to meet each other and have some fun? We asked the community and the response was overwhelmingly positive. We had no choice! Time for some action!

relatedRecords.name: Webflow Virtual World Tour
relatedRecords.description: 3 weeks. 12 events. 9 time zones. August–September 2020. Take a trip around the world with the Webflow team, and hear from local customers and experts.
